definition: final exam/to take an end-of-term exam/(Tw) college entrance exam (abbr. for 大學入學考試|大学入学考试[da4 xue2 ru4 xue2 kao3 shi4])
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father

sentences.english: He is always nervous and streaky about the final exam .
sentences.chinese: 他對大考總是感到放心不下的。

sentences.english: The boy is not fully prepared for the final exam.
sentences.chinese: 這個男生對於大考沒做好充分準備。

sentences.english: The year of the Big Test will be 2011.
Seventeen History Records is one of the three history research books compiled in Qing dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 《十七史商榷》是清代三大考史名著之一。

sentences.english: His cheating on the final queered his chances of graduation.
sentences.chinese: 他在大考中作弊影響了他的畢業。

sentences.english: They scrape their knee, they have a big test coming up, they’re going through puberty.
sentences.chinese: 他們有時候會摔傷膝蓋，有大考來臨，會經歷青春期。

sentences.english: Perhaps you have a big test coming up and you are feeling nervous.
sentences.chinese: 也許你正爲了明天的大考感到緊張。

sentences.english: Thinking about the big test made Mark nervous.
sentences.chinese: 想到這場大考，馬克緊張不安。

sentences.english: He lucked out on the final examination.
She was as cool as a cucumber before the big test .
sentences.chinese: 她在大考之前很冷靜鎮定，毫不緊張。

definition: quiz
to take an exam/exam/CL:次[ci4]

college entrance exam (especially as abbr. for 普通高等學校招生全國統一考試|普通高等学校招生全国统一考试[Pu3 tong1 Gao1 deng3 Xue2 xiao4 Zhao1 sheng1 Quan2 guo2 Tong3 yi1 Kao3 shi4])/(Tw) entrance exam for senior government service posts (abbr. for 公務人員高等考試|公务人员高等考试)
autumn exam (triennial provincial exam during Ming and Qing)
metropolitan civil service examination (held triennially in spring in imperial times)/Crown Prince's chambers/by extension, the Crown Prince
autumn exam (triennial provincial exam during Ming and Qing)
to publish a roll-call of successful candidates
metropolitan examination (imperial civil service examination)

entrance examination
win or lose, it all ends here/this is the moment to shine

evaluation/to investigate and evaluate
near at hand/imminent/within sight
